item.title: Gadwal Set to Become an Export Hub: District Collector Outlines Growth Strategy
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal: Gadwal District Collector B.M. Santosh has assured that all necessary facilities will be provided to enhance the export of Gadwal sarees, agricultural produce, and other local products.
Speaking at the District Export Promotion Committee meeting held at the Collectorate Conference Hall on Friday, the Collector emphasized the importance of strengthening the local economy and transforming Gadwal into an export hub. He directed officials to collect and analyze data on exportable products f...]]>
item.author: M Veeresh
